Updated November     pm



Mick Fleetwoods restaurant has been lost in the Hawaii wildfires PERIOD

The island nation has been ravaged by fires with  people confirmed dead after the blazes ripped through Maui and now the Fleetwood Mac star has sent his  to all those affected after confirming hes  by the destruction of his Fleetwoods on Front Street eatery which was consumed by the flames PERIOD

In a post on X  formerly known as Twitter  he wrote Fleetwoods on Front Street has been lost and while we are heartbroken our main priority is the safety of our dear staff and team members PERIOD On behalf of myself and my family I share my heartfelt thoughts and prayers for the people of Maui PERIOD We are committed to supporting the community and those affected by this disaster in the days and months and years to come.As many of you have probably seen on the news Lahaina Town has suffered tremendous damage and with that Fleetwoods on Front Street has been lost PERIOD Words can not express the devastation that our community is facing right now PERIOD



The fires broke out on Tuesday .. across Maui and Big Island and its prompted an evacuation of both tourists and residents PERIOD More than  people are confirmed to have died and reports suggest around  are still unaccounted for PERIOD Hundreds of homes have been lost leaving many more people displaced PERIOD

Oprah Winfrey has a house on Maui and on Thursday .. she visited evacuees who have been taking shelter at the islands War Memorial Gymnasium PERIOD She brought supplies including pillows nappies and shampoo and was seen handing them out to those in need PERIOD

Oprah told the BBC 

Maui Mayor Richard Bissen previously said in a video statement posted on Facebook 

Originally published on celebretainment.com part of the BLOX Digital Content Exchange PERIOD
